entry.title: King Of Spice - Flax Seeds Whole - 2.27 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: King of Spice
Type: FOOD
Price: 12.99

King Of Spice - Flax Seed Whole Alsi - 5lbs

Bulk Whole Seeds Add Flavor and texture to Your Favorite Food and Drink Recipes

These seeds add crunchiness and a sweet, nutty flavor to any dish you make. They are also widely used as a garnish on breads and hamburger buns. To intensify their flavor, toast before serving. For a truly special presentation, combine with other seeds for a unique look on special plates.

Whether you own a pizzeria, Italian restaurant, or upscale bistro, this spice is the perfect addition to all of your favorite menu items.

The unique and delicious flavor and aroma is commonly used in Asian, Middle Eastern, Latin American, and Italian cuisines. However, it also works well with traditional Canadian and American dishes.

The bulk pack of spices is a cost-efficient option for high-volume kitchens and can easily be portioned into smaller quantities. Dehydrated spices also last longer than fresh ingredients and are easier to store, making them the perfect addition to any busy, high-output kitchen.

entry.title: Blue Diamond - Diced Almonds Natural - 25 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blue Diamond
Type: BAKING
Price: 179.99

Blue Diamond - Diced Almonds Natural - 25 Lbs

Add texture and taste to your popular dishes with these Diced almonds!

Perfect for your restaurant or bakery's pantry, a quality product at a great value. This versatile ingredient features an endless number of uses, from garnishing salads and string beans to decorating cakes and pastries. Plus, since they're raw, they won't lend any additional salty flavor.

Versatile Culinary Ingredient

They're just the right size for a variety of applications, such as the finishing touch on salads, parfaits, ice cream, fresh fruit, or enhancing the presentation of baked goods. They add crunchy texture and nutty taste to a variety of entrees such as steamed vegetables or crusted fish, without adding any extra salt.

Bulk Supply

Perfect for high volume establishments, this packing keeps your bakery or restaurant well-stocked for the variety of uses. Plus, with an ample amount, it's easy to quickly measure your ingredients or simply grab a spoonful to sprinkle on dishes.
